nodes.text: Heritage tapestries were wall hangings created to tell stories or depict moments in history. These tapestries filled the pillared halls of the Jedi Temple on Coruscant, depicting the history of the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic. Many ancient heritage tapestries depicting the First and Second Great Schisms of the Order remained within the Chamber of Antiquities, the lower levels of the Great Jedi Library on the lost world of Ossus.
